DIALOG.SPEAKER: Boat Fan
DIALOG.TEXT: You see that big boat down by the pier?![halt] Dang,[delay 8] I'd love to get a ticket to ride on that sexy boat.[halt] Mmm[delay 10].[delay 10].[delay 10]. boats. [end]
